name: CAMELTRY
description:
Major improvement have been done to the control interface!

2 new control interfaces, "Tilt" and "Flick", enables more intuitive, smooth and addictive game control!
-Tilt : The Orb will fall in the tilted direction.
-Flick : The stage will rotate in the flicked direction.

Auto save system :
Players can now continue the game from the beginning of the suspended stage.

--------------------------------------------
The story of a soul lost within a labyrinth painting…
Welcome to the world of CAMELTRY!

First released in 1989 as an arcade game, CAMELTRY, has been revitalized with a new worldview.
Overcome a myriad of obstacles as you set out for the goal within this labyrinth of illusions.

Gather items placed throughout the labyrinth to unlock hidden stages.
In the end, will you be able to reach the final painting and escape this enigmatic world?


Controls:
-Roll your Orb to the goal by tilting your iPhone/iPod touch or touching the screen to rotate the stage.
-Be careful, if you touch a time loss block your remaining time will decrease.
-Some blocks can be destroyed if the Orb hits them with a strong enough momentum.
-You can also make the Orb jump by lightly tapping your Orb or tilting your iPhone/iPod Touch back and forth on its axis to shake the stage.


Game Modes:
Practice Mode: Learn about the controls and items
Enigma Mode: Collect items throughout the stages to unlock hidden paintings.

Languages:
English, Japanese
